desc: Lashar Rugs for the finest Persian, Tribal & Kilim rugs & carpets. Best prices online & in-store with free local delivery & 48hr home trial in Toronto.

layout.text: Lashar Rugs - the Finest Persian, Tribal & Kilim Rugs
Discover beautiful classic and modern, handmade, hand-dyed and hand-woven rugs of a range of styles from around the world.
